name: Choro Q 64 2
description: Choro Q 64 2:Hachamecha Grand Prix Race (チョロＱ６４　２ ハチャメチャグランプリレース translates to "ChoroQ 64 2：Hacha-Mecha Grand Prix Race") is a racing game released in 1999 in Japan for the Nintendo 64. It is the sequel to Choro Q 64 (Penny Racers outside Japan) and is part of the Choro Q series. The game is also compatible with the Game Boy Color game Choro Q Hyper Customable GB, using the GB Transfer Pak.
